column4: hi guys any help i installed ubuntu desktop 10.04 after audio is working then suddenly it stop working i cant hear anything on my headset..
try type alsamixer in terminal check up if everything is unmuted
how do i check if its muted..?
00 mean unmuted MM mean muted
i got couple of MM, how do i unmute.
press m on your keyboard u dont need to unmute everything there are different futures like for your microphone etc
hi see this please ---> http://i53.tinypic.com/11iffh0.png
look like speakers are unmuted if you press -> on your keyboard there you will see more options
two types of drivers for sound cards oss isnt as good as alsa  u can find them on irc #oss #alsa
i install a new ubuntu and it only work on oss how to make  it worked with alsa..?
how do you know your ubuntu use oss driver?
i see oss; /dev/dsp; RealtekALC662 (HDA-intel) on my softphone, when i select that it work but with alsa, it wont.
u have got nvidia and acl one thing more there on top of your screen is sound icon open it check what card is selected try to change to otehr one u will see there both your card
if your sound still doesnt work just follow the tutorial i showed to you it work for every acl(intel) card
i got on the hardware is Internal Audio-Digital Audio Stereo Duplex(IEC958)
just test whatever u got there change and test working no? change again working no? again etc u have two cards one nvidia hda other intel acl
but when i do aplay -l  i see only Nvidia no intel...?
this one ALC662 (its realted or intel) second nvidia
here http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=601468 someone has the same card as yours
he did not solve the problem of his audio..:-(
i showed you the first tutorial for acl cards so follow it and see if its working or not
